sense.gloss: to finish, to stop, to end, to put an end to, to bring to a close
to close (a business, etc.), to close down, to shut down, to shut up
to put away, to put back, to keep, to store
to do accidentally, to do without meaning to, to happen to do

sdata.j: すべての↑芸術↑↓げいじゅつ↓↑作品↑↓さくひん↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑最高↑↓さいこう↓の↑作品↑↓さくひん↓の↑中↑↓なか↓にはあらゆる↑事↑↓こと↓が↑実現↑↓じつげん↓されており、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑何↑↓なに↓も↑与↑↓あた↓える↑事↑↓こと↓ができず、↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑落↑↓お↓ちつかない↑心↑↓こころ↓は、ただ↑受動↑↓じゅどう↓↑的↑↓てき↓に↑見↑↓み↓つめる↑事↑↓こと↓に↑飽↑↓あ↓きて|↑仕舞↑↓しま↓う|のだった。
sdata.e: In the greatest of all works of art everything had been realized, I could give nothing, and my restless mind tired of passive contemplation.
